description: Angular component 'ContentComponent' that displays a list of posted content with platform details, content, posted date, and metrics. It fetches data via ApiService on initialization.

classes.name: ContentComponent
classes.description: Angular component for displaying posted content in a table.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component by fetching the posted items from the API.

methods.name: metricKeys
methods.description: Returns the keys of the metrics object for a posted item.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Calls API to load posted items on component initialization.

methods.name: metricKeys
methods.description: Returns the keys of the metrics object for a given posted item.
